songs.title: Telepathy
songs.album: The Get Down (Original Soundtrack from the Netflix Original Series)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse: Christina Aguilera]
You know how to read my mind
I'm lost and it's you I find
Rushin' to my side, you hold me tight
I know when to take your hand
I know when you're feelin' bad
Make you feel you can feel like a man

[Pre-Chorus: Christina Aguilera]
And when you're feelin' blue, I know
You're sad, I'll give you all my love
Cause I know you, yeah I know you
I got your back, I do
Boo you keep me safe from harm
Ooh you take me in your arms
Cause you know me, yeah you know me
You've got telepathy

[Chorus: Christina Aguilera]
I've got you and you've got me
Yeah I know you and you know me
We've got telepathy
Yeah I've got you and you've got me
Yeah I know you and you know me
We've got telepathy
I know you and you know me
We've got telepathy
I know you and you know me
We've got telepathy

[Verse: Christina Aguilera]
You know how to read my mind
I'm lost and it's you I find
Rushin' to my side to hold me tight, you hold me tight
And I know when to take your hand
And I know when you're feelin' bad
Make you feel you can feel like a man, feel like a man

[Pre-Chorus: Christina Aguilera]
Boo you keep me safe from harm
Ooh you take me in your arms
Cause you know me, yeah you know me
You've got telepathy

[Chorus: Christina Aguilera]
I've got you and you've got me
Yeah I know you and you know me
We've got telepathy
Yeah I've got you and you've got me
Yeah I know you and you know me
We've got telepathy
I know you and you know me
We've got telepathy
I know you and you know me
We've got telepathy

[Outro: Christina Aguilera]
I know you and you know me
We've got telepathy
We've got telepathy
